languages.text: "Присутствие подле вас члена {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Инквизиции{/g} послужит лучшим доказательством вашей лояльности".

traits.locale_text: "Присутствие подле вас члена Инквизиции послужит лучшим доказательством вашей лояльности".

languages.text: "The presence of a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} beside you will serve as the best possible proof of your loyalty."
languages.original_text: "Присутствие подле вас члена {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Инквизиции{/g} послужит лучшим доказательством вашей лояльности".

traits.locale_text: "The presence of a member of the Inquisition beside you will serve as the best possible proof of your loyalty."

"The presence of a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} beside you will serve as the best possible proof of your loyalty."

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}異端審問庁{/g}の一員が隣にいるということは、ロード・キャプテンの忠義を示すこの上ない証となりましょう」
languages.original_text: "The presence of a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} beside you will serve as the best possible proof of your loyalty."

traits.locale_text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}異端審問庁{/g}の一員が隣にいるということは、ロード・キャプテンの忠義を示すこの上ない証となりましょう」

languages.text: “{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}审判庭{/g}的成员与您同在，这将会是您效忠神皇的明证。”
languages.original_text: "The presence of a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} beside you will serve as the best possible proof of your loyalty."

traits.locale_text: “{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}审判庭{/g}的成员与您同在，这将会是您效忠神皇的明证。”

languages.text: «La presencia de un miembro de la {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisición{/g} a su lado será la mayor prueba de su lealtad».
languages.original_text: "The presence of a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} beside you will serve as the best possible proof of your loyalty."

traits.locale_text: «La presencia de un miembro de la {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisición{/g} a su lado será la mayor prueba de su lealtad».

languages.text: « La présence d'un membre de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} ne pourra que prouver aux yeux de tous votre loyauté. »
languages.original_text: "The presence of a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} beside you will serve as the best possible proof of your loyalty."

traits.locale_text: « La présence d'un membre de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} ne pourra que prouver aux yeux de tous votre loyauté. »

languages.text: "Ein Mitglied der {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} neben Euch ist der bestmögliche Beweis Eurer Loyalität."
languages.original_text: "The presence of a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} beside you will serve as the best possible proof of your loyalty."

traits.locale_text: "Ein Mitglied der {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} neben Euch ist der bestmögliche Beweis Eurer Loyalität."

languages.text: "Yanınızda bir {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Engizisyon{/g} mensubunun bulunması, sadakatinizin mümkün olan en büyük kanıtı olacaktır."
languages.original_text: "The presence of a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} beside you will serve as the best possible proof of your loyalty."

traits.locale_text: "Yanınızda bir {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Engizisyon{/g} üyesinin bulunması, sadakatinizin mümkünatta en iyi kanıtı olacaktır."
